Different Crime.Crime Name: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act Violation
credibility_findings: RPD found her not credible post-2005 due to inconsistencies
RAD upheld this using reasonableness, also conducting its own assessment
reasonableness_of_decision: RAD erred in applying the reasonableness standard to the RPD's credibility findings
judicial_review_process: Judicial review application based on alleged RAD error in reviewing RPD's credibility findings
Court dismissed the application, upholding RAD's decision
persecution_grounds: Applicant claimed domestic violence as persecution
immigration_status: Applicant sought refugee status in Canada
decision_outcome: Claim rejected due to credibility issues
